data.name: SVFI
data.detailed_description:
SVFI

ğ—•ğ—¬ ğ—¦ğ—¾ğ˜‚ğ—¶ğ—¿ğ—¿ğ—²ğ—¹ ğ——ğ—²ğ˜ƒğ—²ğ—¹ğ—¼ğ—½ğ—ºğ—²ğ—»ğ˜ ğ—§ğ—²ğ—®ğ—º
An app to interpolate your low-fps video or image sequence with AI (make it smoother)
Powered by RIFE: A Real-Time Intermediate Flow Estimation for Video Frame Interpolation Algorithm
- High Flexibility: Interpolate the footage from any fps to another
- Output with extremly High Quality, Flexibility and Speed: Currently support HEVC/H.265, AVC/H.264, ProRes for video output, HDR(HDR10, HDR10+, Dolby Vision[5, 8.1, 8.2], HLG) format supported; TIFF, PNG for image sequence output, ready for post production immediately;NVEnCc, QSVEnCc High Efficient Encoder Supported
- High Hardware Compatibility: NVIDIA or AMD graphic cards are supported
- Excellent results: interpolated result can reach 97.7%+ PSNR in Vimeo90K Dataset evaluation
